snippet: The Jump-Start Our Business Start-Ups Act will bring much-needed help to some of those hardest hit by the economic downturn: Wall Street analysts, short-sellers and lobbyists.
abstract: The Jump-Start Our Business Start-Ups Act will bring much-needed help to some of those hardest hit by the economic downturn: Wall Street analysts, short-sellers and lobbyists.

headline.main: A Jobs Bill That Will Provide Help, but for All the Wrong People
headline.print_headline: The Trade: Jobs Bill Will Provide Help, but for All the Wrong People
